definition: large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout

sentences.english: Entertainment places in the past used to give out free tickets to customers.
sentences.chinese: 過去的遊藝場都會發放紅票給顧客。

sentences.english: Do not remain standing in front of those sitting at a public game.
sentences.chinese: 在遊藝場所裏，不要站在坐着的觀衆前面。
